## PrototypeOf type

Type helper to infer prototype from a constructor function.

Example: `PrototypeOf<typeof Entity>` is resolved to `Entity`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PrototypeOf<Ctor extends Function> = Ctor extends {
    prototype: infer Proto;
} ? Proto : never;
```
